CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Free Trial Opportunity"), IF(AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "USD")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "CAD"))), IF(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Address_NEW__r.Shipping_Country__c, "MEXICO"), "MX Free Trial", "Free Trial EU"),"Free Trial"), IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Work Order"), "Work Order", "NA") )
CustomField.label: Free Trial To Location
